file_content.text: My colleagues still talk about how you killed those Sand People. Thank you again.
You've returned! I was about to pass out from the stench here when I heard reports of your successful massacre.
Perfection as always, my lord. The survivors are weak and scattered. Once we have the well, there'll be no stopping the Empire's advance.
With the Sand People crushed, we can easily take the well. This is a major victory for the Empire.
Quite messy, I hear. I'm sure you did what was necessary. Once the Empire has the well, there'll be no stopping us.
It's obvious the Sand People didn't stand a chance. Soon, the Empire will control the well and then... the rest of Tatooine.
As for myself, I'll finally be stationed somewhere befitting a man of my status. You're my savior--I can't thank you enough.
My pleasure. No one deserves to be stuck on Tatooine.
Glad to be of service.
Indeed. This planet has robbed me of my spirit.
I should have known you'd twist my victory for your benefit.
You self-serving coward.
An unexpected benefit, I assure you. I would never place my needs before the Empire's.
Now, I must pack. I won't forget you when I'm sipping Corellian brandy somewhere far from here.
I'm done here.
Farewell. I shall toast you when I'm drinking Alderaan wine somewhere far from here.
That well should be ours. Do what you must to defeat those Sand People.
Major Brega, at your service. I'm honored that you've graced this dismal planet with your presence.
It's a pleasure, sir. I'm Major Brega. Glad to see an Imperial of repute on this sordid planet.
Glad to see you. I'm Major Brega. I trust you've developed the same hatred for this dirty planet as I have.
We were so close to expanding Imperial influence, introducing refinement to this rock. If you can spare a moment, we may still have a chance!
If the Empire's growth is at risk, I'll remove the threat.
Anything for the Empire.
Thank you. I cannot afford another failure.
The Empire's growth isn't my concern. I could, however, be persuaded....
Only if you can spare credits.
I assure you, success in this matter will be handsomely rewarded.
What did you have in mind?
I'm not joining your decorating brigade.
Doesn't sound like my thing.
No, it's nothing like that! Not to say this sand scab couldn't use a touch up.
There's a well, one of Tatooine's deepest and most successful. Whoever controls it, controls this region.
Imperial Command ordered me to take it, but my men were butchered--by Sand People, no less! This tribe's so ruthless all the other tribes pay them tribute.
The Empire cannot let these filthy savages control such a priceless resource!
I will end their rule.
All right. I get the point.
Excellent. I can't wait to hear of your victory.
You'll be able to fill the well with their bodies when I'm done.
I'll annihilate them.
Enthusiasm. That's good, but we don't want to poison the water with their foul remains.
I'm busy, but maybe.
I hope so. This planet is in dire need of Imperial order.
The well lies deep in the desert. Kill the Sand People who guard it. The Empire will be grateful.
I can't spare any time. Please excuse me.
